akn:content.akn:p: (a) In carrying out the purposes of this subtitle, the Appalachian Regional Commission shall—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Identify Needs and Goals of Subregional Areas.—

akn:content.akn:p: (b) In carrying out its functions under this section, the Commission shall identify the characteristics of, and may distinguish between the needs and goals of, appropriate subregional areas, including central, northern, and southern Appalachia.
